# WARNING: Issues are ignored

This repository is a read-only mirror of the official EPSILOD repository: https://gitlab.com/trasgo-group-valladolid/epsilod - Issues opened here will not be processed.

Please, submit your issues to the official repository: https://gitlab.com/trasgo-group-valladolid/epsilod/-/issues

Thank you for your interest on EPSILOD!
